code: import React from'react';import axios from'axios';import AccountUpdateForm from'./AccountUpdateForm';import{Button}from'semantic-ui-react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Account(_ref){var currentUser=_ref.currentUser,setCurrentUser=_ref.setCurrentUser,onDeleteUser=_ref.onDeleteUser;var name=currentUser.name,id=currentUser.id;function handleDeleteUserClick(){axios.delete("/users/".concat(id)).then(function(response){onDeleteUser(response.data);});}function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("token");setCurrentUser(null);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:'0px 0px 20px 10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountUpdateForm,{currentUser:currentUser,setCurrentUser:setCurrentUser}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleDeleteUserClick,children:"Delete Account"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"mini",onClick:logout,children:"logout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]});}export default Account;
